name: Hippo’s Mini Games
description:
New educational kids games. For boys and girls from 3 years and older!

This set has next educational mini-games:

1 - Connect the dots.
There is Hippo or one of her friends on the screen and then they disappear, a kid needs to repeat the shape of the image, connect all stars. When the task is done, you will see a new picture. 

2 - Coloring.
A colored cartoon character appears for some time and then it becomes black and white. You need to color the cartoon character as it was before. If you have any difficulties, use the hint, click the button "?"

3 - Mixing colors.
Hippo has a jar with some particular color, help her to create the exactly same color. You must mix colors. Add additional paint to a glass bucket, mix colors and look what color you get. Exciting educational kids mini-game, where kid learns to create colors by mixing different paints.

4 - Pairs.
Task for logic and memory development. Rules are very simple: There are some pictures shown for a while and then the pictures appear not in the correct order, your task is to open two identical images. After that, they will disappear. You need to find all pairs. Every level is getting more difficult than the previous. 

5 - Mosaic.
There is an image shown on the screen, which disappears a moment later. Toddler must repeat the pattern, make it from colored mosaics. To use a hint, click the button "?"

6 - Clear the picture. Picture scratch.
Picture scratch is a game for little ones. There is a hidden image on the screen, the player needs to scratch the layer that covers it to see who hides behind.

7 - Puzzles associations.
Kids need to put the pictures in the correct order using intuition of associations. There are 3 task types: Put the pictures together due to colors, patterns or figures.

8 - 3D puzzles.
Collect exciting kids 3D puzzles that consist of 3D blocks. Rotate the blocks in different directions to obtain the desired picture.

9 - Merry tunes.
In this mini game boys and girls need to collect classic tunes from the smaller pieces. There are different parts of the melodies on the screen. Listen to each part separately and put together a famous melody.

At the beginning there are 3 kids mini-games available, you get 10 coins for each completed task. To open the 4th game, player should gather 100 coins, 5th - 150 Coins, 6th - 200 coins, 7th - 300 coins etc.

All mini-games contain Hippo and her friends. Cheerful atmosphere and good mood are not only for kids from 3, 5, 7 years and older but also for all the family.
